content.question: What is implied about Daiki?

choices.label: He graduated from high school fifteen years ago.
He keeps in close touch with his old classmates.
He lives far from his hometown.
He is the president of his company.

content.answer: He lives far from his hometown.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meanings of a text.
